glsa.title: Tar: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in Tar could led to a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: The Tar program provides the ability to create and manipulate tar archives.

description.p: The sparse_dump_region function in sparse.c file in Tar allows an infinite loop using the --sparse option.

impact.p: A local attacker could cause a Denial of Service condition by modifying a file that is supposed to be archived by a different userâ€™s process (e.g., a system backup running as root).

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
